address: 39 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
description:
Light Filled Beach Retreat!!!
You will be pleasantly surprised upon entering this renovated property in the popular Coronet Bay estate well known for its safe swimming beach. All the hard work has been done for you and the house is move in ready!!!
New paint and tiled flooring throughout reflects the natural light making it bright and cheery. Consisting of a spacious living area with a large split-system airconditioner keeping the home at preferred temperatures all year round and ceiling fans to help circulate the air as well. The cosy kitchen includes gas cooking, dishwasher and an extra large fridge space pantry area. All 3 bedrooms are of good size with built in robes, master having en suite, study and the main bathroom boasts all new everything giving it a stylish modern look including a full size bath to relax in. The large entertaining deck has been upgraded and freshly painted. There is an older style single garage which is great for garden tools/workshop or extra storage space as has a concrete floor. The yard is low maintenance and is fully fenced with gate access to the front of the property. Take a stroll to the safe sandy swimming beach, bbq area, shop and park or enjoy the gorgeous coastal walks on offer. Grantville township is only 7 minutes away offering a group of shops including permanent doctor, chemist, bank, bakery, ambulance depot, cafes etc. A local primary school and new day care/kindergarten is under 5 minutes drive. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway and 20 minutes to Phillip Island. This bayside property is in the perfect location for a sea change or the ideal getaway/holiday house.
